# prefersFullSizePreview

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates that the drag item preview should be shown at its full, original size.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var prefersFullSizePreview: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Set [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIDropProposal/prefersFullSizePreview] to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to show the preview at its original size, not scaled down to a smaller size. For example, you might set this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when the user moves items from a nearby view and scaling down the preview is distracting.

This property applies only to drag and drop activities performed within the same app.

## Configuring a drop proposal

- **isPrecise**: A Boolean value that proposes that the drop interaction define the drop location precisely, such as at a specific point within existing text.
